articles.title: Are Probiotics an Effective Treatment for Respiratory Tract Infection? - American Society for Nutrition
articles.description: Review published in Advances in Nutrition suggest probiotics “modestly reduce the incidence, duration, and severity of respiratory tract infection Respiratory           Read More
articles.content: Respiratory tract infections, illnesses such as COVID-19 that lead to infections of the sinuses, throat, airways and lungs, are common.  They exist on a spectrum from nuisances such as sore throat an… [+4419 chars]
